AND (tb.account_id = #{accountId} OR ta.contact_account_id = #{accountId})
AND (tb.account_id = #{accountId} OR ta.contact_account_id = #{accountId} OR ta.type=1)
AND (tb.account_id = #{accountId} OR ta.contact_account_id = #{accountId})
AND ta.status= #{status}
ORDER BY ta.create_time DESC
